\documentclass[tikz]{standalone}
\usepackage{quiver}
\usepackage{tikz-cd}

\begin{document}

\Huge
% https://q.uiver.app/?
\begin{tikzcd}
	c & {\coprod_{a\in A} c} & c \\
	\\
	& {\coprod_{b\in B} c}
	\arrow["{\iota_{a_1}}", hook, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\iota_{a_2}}"', hook', from=1-3, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\iota_{fa_1}}"', hook, from=1-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\iota_{fa_2}}", hook', from=1-3, to=3-2]
	\arrow["Ff"{description}, dashed, from=1-2, to=3-2]
\end{tikzcd}

\end{document}
